title: DNA Methylation data analysis
questions: What is methylation and why it cannot be recognised by a normal NGS procedure?
Can a different methylation influence the expression of a gene? How?
Which tools you can use to analyse methylation data?
objectives: Learn how to analyse methylation data
Get a first intuition what are common pitfalls.
key_points: The output of a methylation NGS is having a different distribution of the four bases. This is caused by the bisulfite treatment of the DNA.
If there is a different level of methylation in the loci of a gene this can be a hint that something is wrong.
To get useful results you need -- data, data and data!

workflows.name: Workflow Methylation Seq
workflows.title: Workflow Methylation Seq
